name: taxi-queue-monorepo
description: Taxi Queue Management System - Microservices Monorepo

scripts.generate:auth: node generator/src/cli.js generate --name auth-service --template auth --port 50051 --db mongodb
scripts.generate:user: node generator/src/cli.js generate --name user-service --template user --port 50052 --db mongodb
scripts.generate:queue: node generator/src/cli.js generate --name queue-service --template queue --port 50053 --db mongodb
scripts.generate:geo: node generator/src/cli.js generate --name geo-service --template geo --port 50054 --db postgres
scripts.generate:vehicle: node generator/src/cli.js generate --name vehicle-service --template vehicle --port 50055 --db mongodb
scripts.generate:payment: node generator/src/cli.js generate --name payment-service --template payment --port 50056 --db mongodb
scripts.generate:config: node generator/src/cli.js generate --name config-service --template config --port 50057 --db mongodb
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:auth && npm run generate:user && npm run generate:queue && npm run generate:geo && npm run generate:vehicle && npm run generate:payment && npm run generate:config
scripts.docker:build:all: npm run docker:build && cd auth-service && npm run docker:build && cd ../user-service && npm run docker:build && cd ../queue-service && npm run docker:build && cd ../geo-service && npm run docker:build && cd ../vehicle-service && npm run docker:build && cd ../payment-service && npm run docker:build && cd ../config-service && npm run docker:build
